name: Zachs Epic Tutorials To Epic Stuff (Alex Basics Mod)
name_original: Zachs Epic Tutorials To Epic Stuff (Alex Basics Mod)
description:
Install instructions

Install instructions How to Download: 1. Download Moddable version of Alex's Basics 2. Download this mod 3. Put the mod in assetpacks 4. Open the game and click the folder in down-left 5. Select the mod 6. Enjoy!
